citances.sentence: In concluding this part we are not satisfied that the injuries or diseases sought to be accepted are related to the operational service rendered by the deceased. The enquiry under s 196(14) is not concerned with finding whether the injuries or diseases are war caused (refer Cunningham v Repatriation Commission [2009] FCA 1272 at [40]).
